attributes.action: Reduce the number of Politicians and MP'S to a reduce the Taxpayers bill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I seek to ask the Prime Minister to have a review of this countries political system and actively seek a reduction in the number of MP'S and Politicians in the House of Commons.

Unemployment is on the rise again and the Country is in a mess and what is the House of Commons doing about it nothing, We all see the goodwill gestures all the big speeches and grand plans for change.

We the people of this country are not stupid and should not be treated with the contempt that has been thus far shown.

Until the government and our other other state paid employees are prepared to fight for the common men, women and other hard working people of this country and stand up and listen to the people that pay their wages then maybe we should as a country be seeking job losses and redundancies in the House of Commons.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
